welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Los Gatos! This charming town is known for its tree-lined streets, quaint shops, and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and discover all that Los Gatos has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reid-Hillview Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Reid-Hillview Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mineta San Jose International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mineta San Jose International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palo Alto Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a restaurant, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Palo Alto Airport provides services for private and corporate aircraft, including fueling, maintenance, and hangar rental.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal and private aviation terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Watsonville Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Watsonville Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Half Moon Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Half Moon Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Terminal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Air Terminal Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
